title: Pork pie with chicken and apricots
description: We've taken Andrew's delicious recipe and made it suitable for a normal cake tin so you can easily try it at home – no specially commissioned pie moulds required. For this recipe you will need a 20cm/8in deep, round springform cake tin and a baking tray large enough to sit the cake tin in.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
150g/5½oz vegetable fat (such as Trex), plus extra for greasing
200g/7oz boneless chicken thighs, cut into bite-sized pieces
4 sprigs lemon thyme, leaves picked (normal thyme also works)
1 baking potato, peeled and very thinly sliced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
